title: Crete: the island and it's people. Part 3
creator_credit: Central Office of Information, Ministry of Education
brief_description: Characteristic activities in a small village are shown; grinding of corn, farming, irrigation, hand reaping and threshing, growing of oranges, shearing and spinning wool, pottery making using the wheel, market day activities, ploughing with a primitive plough.
